starting.title: The best time to plant a sapling was twenty years ago, the second best time is now. Let's start planting the seeds of success!
starting.agreement: By continuing you agree to our Privacy Policy.

onboarding.discoverOurApp: Get ready to discover our application!
onboarding.planningBringsSuccess: Planning brings success. Easily track your daily goals and get closer to success step by step. Achieving your goals is now much more organized and achievable!
onboarding.effectiveTimeManagement: Effective time management transforms your life. Complete your tasks faster and stress-free by consciously planning your time.
onboarding.progressFuelsMotivation: Progress fuels motivation. Constantly improve yourself by focusing on your achievements, always keep your motivation high and exceed the limits.
onboarding.concentrationBreedsPerfection: Concentration breeds perfection. Use Pomodoro to help you complete tasks more systematically and increase productivity.
